```{r}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)


#Amplification data
pcr <- read_excel("pcr.xls", 
                  col_names = FALSE,
                  sheet = "Amplification Data")


#Metadata
pcr_metadata = pcr %>% 
  slice_head(n=39) %>% 
  select(1:2) %>% 
  rename(info = "...1",
         params = "...2")

#Dados
## Estruturar tabela
tabela1 = pcr %>% 
  rename(well = "...1") %>% 
  filter(!well %in% c(pcr_metadata$info))
colnames_corretos <- as.character(tabela1[1, ])
tabela1 <- tabela1[-1, ]
colnames(tabela1) <- colnames_corretos

tabela_pcr_clean = tabela1 %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(cycle = as.numeric(cycle),
         rn = as.numeric(rn),
         delta_rn = as.numeric(delta_rn)) %>% 
  drop_na(target_name)

tabela_pcr_norm 

ctrl = tabela_pcr_clean %>%
  filter(target_name == "U6") %>% 
  group_by(cycle) %>% 
  summarize(mean_ctrl = mean(delta_rn)) 

tabela_pcr_norm = tabela_pcr_clean %>% 
  filter(target_name != "U6") %>% 
  inner_join(ctrl, by = "cycle") %>% 
  mutate(delta_delta_rn = delta_rn - mean_ctrl,
         rel_exp = 2^(-delta_delta_rn))

```

Plotar dados
```{r fig.height=5, fig.width=5}
pcr_raw_plot = tabela_pcr_clean %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = cycle,
      y = delta_rn,
      color = target_name,
      group = well,
      # group = target_name,
      # color = target_name,
      # fill = target_name
      ) +
  geom_line(alpha = 0.2, 
            show.legend = T) +
    stat_summary(geom="errorbar", 
               fun.data = mean_cl_boot,
               width = 0.5, 
               size = 0.5,
               alpha = 1,
               mapping = aes(group = target_name)) +
    stat_summary(fun.y = mean, 
                 geom = "point",
               # color = "black",
               size = 1,
               alpha = 1,
               mapping = aes(group = target_name)) +
  scale_color_aaas()+
  scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0,0)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(text = element_text(color = "black",
                            size = 10),
        axis.text.x = element_text(size = 10,
                                   color = "black"),
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 10,
                                   color = "black"),
        axis.ticks = element_line(size = 0.5,
                                    color = "black"),
        axis.line = element_line(size = 0.5),
        legend.position = "top",
        legend.text = element_text(size = 10),
        panel.grid = element_line(linetype = 2,
                                  color = "gray90")) +
  labs(x = "Cycle",
       y = "ΔRn",
       color = "Target",
       # title = "PCR Amplification plot",
       # subtitle = "Target amplification by wells. Bootstrapped CI 95%.",
       # caption = "Ref: Paula, Geovanna"
       )
```
